# Kamino Docs

## Automated Liquidity

- [Introduction](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/introduction)
- [CLMMs and Kamino](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/clmms-and-kamino): CLMMs have changed the DEX landscape by solving the issues of inefficient liquidity.
- [Liquidity Vault Overview](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/liquidity-vault-overview): Kamino has three automation components that enable a seamless yield experience
- [Auto-swap](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/liquidity-vault-overview/auto-swap): Automatically swap tokens for seamless deposits and withdrawals
- [Auto-compound](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/liquidity-vault-overview/auto-compound): Kamino auto-compounds all your DEX earnings right back into your position
- [Auto-rebalance](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/liquidity-vault-overview/auto-rebalance): Position ranges and management can be complex. Kamino takes care of it.
- [Yield & APYs](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/yield-and-apys): Kamino produces yield from volume across the Solana ecosystem
- [Ranges & Rebalancing](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/ranges-and-rebalancing): Ranges in a CLMM can be a tough nut to crack. Kamino does it for you.
- [Fees](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/fees)
- [kTokens](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/ktokens)
- [Vault Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies): Kamino provides a strategy for every market condition and risk profile
- [SOL-only Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies/sol-only-strategies): Earn dual yield, while maintaining single-sided exposure to the SOL price
- [Stablecoin Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies/stablecoin-strategies): Stablecoin vaults deliver USD yield via stablecoin trading volume
- [Mixed Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies/mixed-strategies): Earn degen yields while taking higher market risk on different assets
- [Volatile - Volatile Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies/mixed-strategies/volatile-volatile-strategies): Earn high yields on volatile pairs that can diverge in price
- [Volatile - Stable Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/vault-strategies/mixed-strategies/volatile-stable-strategies): Earn high yields by pairing a volatile asset to a stablecoin
- [Creator Vaults](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults): This page will explain Kamino's permissionless vault primitive.
- [Step 1: Core Setup](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/step-1-core-setup): This page covers the core setup of your vault
- [Step 2: Strategy Setup](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/step-2-strategy-setup): This page explores how you can tailor your Creator Vault strategy
- [Strategy Simulator](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/strategy-simulator): This page covers Kamino's live strategy simulator software
- [Creator Strategies](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/creator-strategies): Select a strategy and customize it to your liking.
- [Fixed Range](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/creator-strategies/fixed-range): Market Make with no rebalancing
- [Tracker](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/creator-strategies/tracker): Always earn fees with automated rebalancing
- [Rebalancing](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/creator-vaults/rebalancing): Rebalancing process for creator
- [Private Vaults](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/liquidity-vaults/private-vaults)
- [Overview](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/farms-and-locked-liquidity/overview)
- [JTO Liquidity Program](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/farms-and-locked-liquidity/jto-liquidity-program)
- [bSOL Liquidity Program](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/farms-and-locked-liquidity/bsol-liquidity-program)
- [Staking Your kTokens](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/farms-and-locked-liquidity/staking-your-ktokens)
- [Risks & Technical](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/risks-and-technical)
- [Impermanent Loss](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/risks-and-technical/impermanent-loss): The risks of impermanent loss in automated market making
- [Depeg Events](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/risks-and-technical/depeg-events): Pegged tokens are meant to remain tied to an underlying value. What happens if it loses that peg?
- [Oracles](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/risks-and-technical/oracles): Kamino uses numerous oracle security measures to increase resilience
- [Deposit & Withdrawal Limits](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/deposit-and-withdrawal-limits): Limits that protect users from potential bad actors on the platform
- [Security Audits](https://docs.kamino.finance/automated-liquidity/security-and-risks/security-audits): Kamino takes every precaution available to protect usersâ€™ funds. Find our latest audits here.
